channel.title: Workings on RentEasy
channel.description: Recent content in Workings on RentEasy

item.title: Our Company
item.description: RentEasy is an open company. The default visibility of our companies information is open, with the blinds only being closed where it’s required. Trust is the foundation of the economy. The law establishes a minimum baseline of trustworthiness, and the status quo for companies is to operate near this baseline. What if we tried to maximize trust? From: https://www.opencompany.org/about/ RentEasy’s goal is to provide tenants and landlords with amazing tools to help them keep renting.
